Uses of Class
com.fizzikgames.fizlib.math.SquareMatrix2f

  • Packages that use SquareMatrix2f 
    Package Description
    com.fizzikgames.fizlib.math
    Various helpful math constructs and tools.

    • Uses of SquareMatrix2f in com.fizzikgames.fizlib.math

      Methods in com.fizzikgames.fizlib.math that return SquareMatrix2f 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SquareMatrix2f SquareMatrix2f.applyTransform(SquareMatrix2f m)
      Returns the matrix attained from applying this linear transformation to a given matrix.
      static SquareMatrix2f SquareMatrix2f.axisReflectionMatrix(boolean xAxis, boolean yAxis)
      Returns the standard reflection matrix for a linear transformation that reflects through either the xAxis, yAxis, or both(origin).
      SquareMatrix2f SquareMatrix2f.copy()
      Returns a copy of this matrix.
      SquareMatrix2f SquareMatrix2f.inverse()
      Returns the inverse of the matrix
      static SquareMatrix2f SquareMatrix2f.multiply(SquareMatrix2f m1, SquareMatrix2f m2)
      Returns the 2x2 matrix result of multiplying a given 2x2 matrix by another given 2x2 matrix.
      static SquareMatrix2f SquareMatrix2f.rotationMatrix(double theta)
      Returns the standard rotation matrix for a linear transformation that rotates by the given angle in radians counter-clockwise.
      static SquareMatrix2f SquareMatrix2f.scaleMatrix(float xScale, float yScale)
      Returns the standard scale matrix for a linear transformation that contracts and expands by given scalars across the x and y axis.
      static SquareMatrix2f SquareMatrix2f.shearMatrix(float xShear, float yShear)
      Returns the standard shear matrix for a linear transformation that shears by the given amount in the x and y axis.
      SquareMatrix2f SquareMatrix2f.transpose()
      Returns the transpose of the matrix

      Returns the vector result of multiplying a given 2x2 matrix by a given vector.
